mapper.select: select itemdesc,sum(weight) as weight from twms_pltitem_just group by itemdesc

select twms_loc_just.line as line,twms_loc_just.lie as lie,twms_loc_just.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt_just.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem_just.enterdate as enterdate from is_location,twms_plt_just,twms_pltitem_just,twms_loc_just, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt_just.currloc=twms_loc_just.locnum and twms_plt_just.vpltnum=twms_pltitem_just.vpltnum and twms_plt_just.vpltnum = #{vpltnum}
select itemdesc,sum(weight) as weight from twms_pltitem group by itemdesc

select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and twms_plt.vpltnum = #{vpltnum}

select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum order by twms_pltitem.enterdate
select count(lotnum) from twms_pltitem
select count(lotnum) from twms_pltitem where lotnum = 'None'

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart}

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by line

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by line desc

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by lie

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by lie desc

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by layer

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and ROWNUM <= #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno > #{rangeStart} order by layer desc

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by line

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by line desc

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by lie

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by lie desc

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by layer

select t.* from (select twms_loc.line as line,twms_loc.lie as lie,twms_loc.layer as layer,location_x as locationX,location_y as locationY,location_z as locationZ,twms_plt.vpltnum as vplnum,pltnum,currloc,itemdesc,lotnum,twms_pltitem.enterdate as enterdate,twms_pltitem.linenum as lineNum,twms_pltitem.extattr1 as boxNum,twms_pltitem.weight as weight,ROWNUM as rowno from is_location,twms_plt,twms_pltitem,twms_loc, (select to_number(concat(concat(to_char(layer),to_char(a_line)),to_char(a_lie))) linelielayer,locnum ,line,lie,layer from (select lpad(lie,2,0) a_lie, lpad(line,2,0) a_line, layer, locnum, line, lie from twms_locc_just loc)) locc where locc.linelielayer=is_location.location_id and twms_plt.currloc=twms_loc.locnum and twms_plt.vpltnum=twms_pltitem.vpltnum and itemdesc=#{brand} and (twms_pltitem.lotnum=#{batch} or twms_pltitem.lotnum is null) and ROWNUM < #{rangeEnd}) t where rowno >= #{rangeStart} order by layer desc
